entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parent 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Humidity: 93 %

Dewpoint: -2.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
